revision.text: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Challenge !! Recommended !! Requirements |- | Regional Attack Debuff || Yes || Lowers Pokémon attack based on native region and highest reached region. (See [[Regions]] for the debuffs) |- | Require Complete Pokédex || Yes || Requires a complete regional pokédex before moving on to the next region. (See each [[Regions]] page for more) |- | No Click Attack || No || Prevents clicking on pokemon to deal damage. |- | No Battle Item || No || Prevents the use of the 6 [[Battle Items]] or the 12 [[Flutes]]. |- | No Masterball || No || Prevents the use of [[Masterball|Masterballs]]. |- | No Oak Item || No || Prevents the use of [[Oak Items]]. |- | No Gem || No || Prevents the use of [[Gems]] and [[Flutes]]. |- | No Protein || No || Prevents the use of [[Protein|Proteins]]. |- | Slow EVs || No || Diminishes the rate at which [[Pokérus|EVs]] are gained.. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
